titleStmt.title: A copy of a brief treatise of the proper subject and administration of Baptism: Some years since sent by the author to Thomas late Lord Bishop of Lincoln. With a prefatory epistle thereunto, and the scriptures cited at large
titleStmt.author: Dean, Richard, fl. 1693.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for the author; and are to be sold by Thomas Fabian, at the Bible in Cheapside near Breadstreet,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Trinity College Library, Dublin.

place.placeName: the Bible in Cheapside near Breadstreet
